#{signconfirmVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNCONFIRM = #{signconfirm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STORE_NAME = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_EMPLOYEE = #{createEmployee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_EMPLOYEE_VAL = #{createEmployeeVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_EMP_ID = #{salesEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_EMP_NAME = #{salesEmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_EMP_DEPT_ID = #{salesEmpDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_EMP_DEPT_NAME = #{salesEmpDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTICLES_BORROW = #{particlesBorrow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDIT_SESAME = #{creditSesame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_TYPE = #{auditType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SOURCES = #{sources,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SOURCES_TEXT = #{sourcesText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCES_VALUE = #{sourcesValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUGGEST_RATE = #{suggestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUGGEST_AMOUNT = #{suggestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT_PAY_VAL = #{productPayVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_PAY = #{productPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT_FEE_RATE = #{productFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT_RATE = #{productRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPLY_PERIOD = #{applyPeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPLY_AMOUNT = #{applyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGREED_PRODUCT = #{agreedProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREED_AMOUNT = #{agreedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_ADDR = #{idAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_MOBILE = #{custMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_AGE = #{custAge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUST_SEX = #{custSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_TYPE_VAL = #{idTypeVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_TYPE = #{idType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVESCODE = #{invescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_USE = #{loanUse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOAN_USE_VAL = #{loanUseVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_USE_TEXT = #{loanUseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME_BEFORE = #{nameBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADUATE_INSTITUTIONS = #{graduateInstitutions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RAISE_PERSON = #{raisePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILD_NUMBER = #{childNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_TEL = #{houseTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MARITAL_STATUS_VAL = #{maritalStatusVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_RESIDENCE_DATE = #{startResidenceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EDU_BACKGROUND = #{eduBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDU_BACKGROUND_VAL = #{eduBackgroundVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_WECHAT = #{qqWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COME_HERE_DATE = #{comeHereDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RRESIDENCE_ADDRESS = #{rresidenceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RRESIDENCE_PROV_CODE = #{rresidenceProvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RRESIDENCE_PROV_NAME = #{rresidenceProvName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RRESIDENCE_CITY_CODE = #{rresidenceCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RRESIDENCE_CITY_NAME = #{rresidenceCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RRESIDENCE_AREA_CODE = #{rresidenceAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RRESIDENCE_AREA_NAME = #{rresidenceAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RRESIDENCE_ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{rresidenceAddressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RRESIDENCE_ZIP_CODE = #{rresidenceZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_ADDRESS = #{houseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_PROV_CODE = #{houseProvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_PROV_NAME = #{houseProvName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_CITY_CODE = #{houseCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_CITY_NAME = #{houseCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_AREA_CODE = #{houseAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_AREA_NAME = #{houseAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{houseAddressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_ZIP_CODE = #{houseZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIVE_CONDITIONS = #{liveConditions,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LIVE_CONDITIONS_VAL = #{liveConditionsVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RENT_MONTHLY_PAY = #{rentMonthlyPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_MAIL_ADDR = #{validMailAddr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VALID_MAIL_ADDR_VAL = #{validMailAddrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_MAIL_ADDR_TXT = #{validMailAddrTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_POST_CODE = #{validPostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_STATUE = #{delStatue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT_TYPE_ID = #{productTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME = #{productTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_EMP_ID = #{lastUpdateEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_EMP_NAME = #{lastUpdateEmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUBMIT_TYPE_TEXT = #{submitTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBMIT_EMP_ID = #{submitEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBMIT_EMP_NAME = #{submitEmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBMIT_DATE = #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AGREE_PERIOD = #{agreePeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGREE_PRODUCT_ID = #{agreeProductId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TEMP = #{isTemp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_TEMP_VAL = #{isTempVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_APP = #{isApp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_APP_VAL = #{isAppVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARITAL_STATUS_TEXT = #{maritalStatusText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREED_PRODUCT_ALIAS = #{agreedProductAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NAME_ALIAS = #{productNameAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME_ALIAS = #{productTypeNameAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUGGEST_RESULT_ID = #{suggestResultId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUGGEST_RESULT_VAL = #{suggestResultVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUGGEST_RESULT_CAUSE = #{suggestResultCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACTS_TIME = #{contractsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_ADDRESS = #{applyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP_ADDRESS = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_TYPE_ID = #{custTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CUST_TYPE_VAL = #{custTypeVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where APPLY_ID = #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM HS_APPLY

select HS.APPLY_DATE,HS.PRODUCT_ID, HS.PRODUCT_RATE, HS.APPLY_PERIOD, HS.APPLY_AMOUNT,HS.AGREED_AMOUNT,HS.AGREED_PRODUCT, HS.PRODUCT_NAME,HS.PROC_STATUS_VAL, HS.PROC_STATUS,HS.PROC_INST_ID,HS.LOAN_ID,HS.APPLY_ID,HS.AUDIT_TYPE,HS.SOURCES,HS.SOURCES_VALUE,HS.SIGNCONFIRM,HS.SIGNCONFIRM_VAL, HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_ID, HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME,HS.AGREE_PERIOD, HS.AGREE_PRODUCT_ID, HS.PRODUCT_NAME_ALIAS,HS.AGREED_PRODUCT_ALIAS,HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME_ALIAS, CON.CON_STATUS from HS_APPLY HS LEFT JOIN HS_CONTRACT CON ON HS.APPLY_ID=CON.APPLY_ID where HS.CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HS.IS_APP=1 order by APPLY_DATE

select HS.APPLY_DATE,HS.PRODUCT_ID, HS.PRODUCT_RATE, HS.APPLY_PERIOD, HS.APPLY_AMOUNT,HS.AGREED_AMOUNT,HS.AGREED_PRODUCT, HS.PRODUCT_NAME,HS.PROC_STATUS_VAL, HS.PROC_STATUS,HS.PROC_INST_ID,HS.LOAN_ID,HS.APPLY_ID,HS.AUDIT_TYPE,HS.SOURCES,HS.SOURCES_VALUE,HS.SIGNCONFIRM,HS.SIGNCONFIRM_VAL, HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_ID, HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME,HS.AGREE_PERIOD, HS.AGREE_PRODUCT_ID, HS.PRODUCT_NAME_ALIAS,HS.AGREED_PRODUCT_ALIAS,HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME_ALIAS, CON.CON_STATUS from HS_APPLY HS LEFT JOIN HS_CONTRACT CON ON HS.APPLY_ID=CON.APPLY_ID where HS.CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HS.IS_APP!=1 order by APPLY_DATE

select HS.APPLY_DATE,HS.PRODUCT_ID, HS.PRODUCT_RATE, HS.APPLY_PERIOD, HS.APPLY_AMOUNT,HS.AGREED_AMOUNT,HS.AGREED_PRODUCT, HS.PRODUCT_NAME,HS.PROC_STATUS_VAL, HS.PROC_STATUS,HS.PROC_INST_ID,HS.LOAN_ID,HS.APPLY_ID,HS.AUDIT_TYPE,HS.SOURCES,HS.SOURCES_VALUE,HS.SIGNCONFIRM,HS.SIGNCONFIRM_VAL, HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_ID, HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME,HS.AGREE_PERIOD, HS.AGREE_PRODUCT_ID, HS.PRODUCT_NAME_ALIAS,HS.AGREED_PRODUCT_ALIAS,HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME_ALIAS, CON.CON_STATUS,CON.BACK_BRANCH,CON.BANK_NO,CON.INTEREST,CON.CON_AMOUNT,CON.PAY_DATE,CON.BANK from HS_APPLY HS LEFT JOIN HS_CONTRACT CON ON HS.APPLY_ID=CON.APPLY_ID where HS.CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HS.PROC_STATUS='success' order by APPLY_DATE

SELECT HP.BUSINESS_KEY_,HT.ID_,HT.PROC_DEF_ID_,HT.TASK_DEF_KEY_,HT.PROC_INST_ID_, HT.EXECUTION_ID_,HT.NAME_,HT.PARENT_TASK_ID_,EMP.EMP_NAME ASSIGNEE_,HT.START_TIME_,HT.CLAIM_TIME_, HT.END_TIME_, HT.DURATION_,TBL.IN_HANDLE_OPINION DELETE_REASON_ FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST HP INNER JOIN ACT_HI_TASKINST HT ON HP.ID_=HT.PROC_INST_ID_ AND HP.ID_=#{procInstId} LEFT JOIN HS_EMPLOYEE EMP ON HT.ASSIGNEE_ = EMP.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TASK_ID,HANDLE_OPINION_VAL,IN_HANDLE_OPINION FROM HS_PRE_AUDIT UNION SELECT TASK_ID,HANDLE_OPINION_VAL,IN_HANDLE_OPINION FROM HS_FINAL_AUDIT ) TBL ON HT.ID_=TBL.TASK_ID WHERE HP.BUSINESS_KEY_=#{applyId} ORDER BY HT.START_TIME_ desc
SELECT AUDIT_TYPE FROM HS_APPLY WHERE APPLY_ID = #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT HS.APPLY_DATE,HS.PRODUCT_ID, HS.PRODUCT_RATE, HS.APPLY_PERIOD, HS.APPLY_AMOUNT,HS.AGREED_AMOUNT,HS.AGREED_PRODUCT, HS.PRODUCT_NAME,HS.PROC_STATUS_VAL, HS.PROC_STATUS,HS.PROC_INST_ID,HS.LOAN_ID,HS.APPLY_ID,HS.AUDIT_TYPE,HS.SOURCES,HS.SOURCES_VALUE,HS.SIGNCONFIRM,HS.SIGNCONFIRM_VAL, HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_ID, HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME,HS.AGREE_PERIOD, HS.AGREE_PRODUCT_ID,HS.STORE_NAME, HS.STORE_ID, HS.PRODUCT_NAME_ALIAS,HS.AGREED_PRODUCT_ALIAS,HS.PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME_ALIAS FROM HS_APPLY HS WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROC_STATUS='makeCon' order by APPLY_DATE
SELECT SUM(APPLY_AMOUNT) amt FROM hs_apply where CUST_ID= #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_APP=1
SELECT APPLY_AMOUNT,PRODUCT_NAME,AGREED_AMOUNT,AGREED_PRODUCT FROM hs_apply where CUST_ID= #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_APP=1

SELECT HS.AGREED_AMOUNT,HS.AGREED_PRODUCT,HS.APPLY_PERIOD,HS.APPLY_DATE,HS.PRODUCT_RATE, HS.APPLY_PERIOD, HS.APPLY_AMOUNT, HS.PRODUCT_NAME,HS.PROC_STATUS_VAL, HS.PROC_STATUS,HS.PROC_INST_ID,HS.LOAN_ID,HS.APPLY_ID,HS.CUST_ID,HS.AUDIT_TYPE,HS.SIGNCONFIRM,HS.SIGNCONFIRM_VAL,HS.STORE_ID,HS.STORE_NAME WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROC_STATUS='loan' order by APPLY_DATE
select APPLY_ID from HS_APPLY where LOAN_ID=#{loanId}

SELECT COUNT(APP.APPLY_ID) CUT,TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') DT FROM HS_APPLY APP WHERE TO_CHAR(APP.APPLY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_CHAR(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(APP.APPLY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=TO_CHAR(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ASC
SELECT PROC_STATUS,PROC_STATUS_VAL FROM HS_APPLY WHERE APPLY_ID=#{applyId}
mapper.update: update HS_APPLY set AGREE_PERIOD = #{agreePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AGREE_PRODUCT_ID = #{agreeProductId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREED_AMOUNT= #{agreedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , AGREED_PRODUCT = #{agreedProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREED_PRODUCT_ALIAS = #{agreedProductAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where APPLY_ID=#{applyId}
mapper.select: select CUST_ID,STORE_ID,STORE_NAME,INVESCODE,PRODUCT_ID,PRODUCT_NAME,CUST_MOBILE,ID_NUMBER,CUST_NAME,LOAN_USE LOAN_USE_VAL ,APPLY_ID FROM hs_apply where APPLY_ID=#{applyId}
SELECT CUST_ID FROM HS_APPLY WHERE LOAN_ID = #{loanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM HS_APPLY appl WHERE appl.APPLY_ID=#{applyId} AND appl.DEL_STATUE=0

SELECT * FROM HS_APPLY APY LEFT JOIN HS_ASSET_INFO ASS ON APY.APPLY_ID = ASS.APPLY_ID LEFT JOIN HS_OCCUPATIONAL_INFO OCC ON APY.APPLY_ID = OCC.APPLY_ID LEFT JOIN HS_CONTACTS CNS ON APY.APPLY_ID = CNS.APPLY_ID WHERE APY.APPLY_ID=#{applyId} AND APY.DEL_STATUE=0 and (CNS.IS_FILL_IN=1 or CNS.IS_FILL_IN is null)
SELECT ap.APPLY_ID,ap.ID_NUMBER,ap.CUST_NAME FROM HS_APPLY ap WHERE APPLY_ID = #{applyId} AND AP.DEL_STATUE=0
SELECT ap.APPLY_ID,ap.CUST_NAME,ap.ID_NUMBER,ap.SUBMIT_TYPE_TEXT,ap.LOAN_ID FROM HS_APPLY ap WHERE APPLY_ID = #{applyId} AND ap.DEL_STATUE=0
SELECT ap.APPLY_ID,ap.CREATE_EMPLOYEE,ap.CREATE_EMPLOYEE_VAL FROM HS_APPLY ap WHERE APPLY_ID = #{applyId} AND ap.DEL_STATUE=0
SELECT AP.IS_TEMP FROM HS_APPLY ap WHERE AP.APPLY_ID=#{applyId}
SELECT COUNT(PROC_INST_ID_) FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST WHERE BUSINESS_KEY_=#{applyId}
SELECT COUNT(APPLY_ID) FROM HS_APPLY WHERE APPLY_ID=#{applyId} AND PROC_STATUS IS NOT NULL
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME_ALIAS FROM HS_APPLY WHERE APPLY_ID=#{applyId}
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME_ALIAS, AGREED_PRODUCT_ALIAS, AGREED_AMOUNT FROM HS_APPLY WHERE APPLY_ID=#{applyId}

SELECT * FROM HS_APPLY WHERE ID_NUMBER=#{idCard} AND ( (PROC_STATUS!='success' AND PROC_STATUS!='waiver' AND PROC_STATUS!='reject' AND PROC_STATUS!='rejectPool' ) OR PROC_STATUS IS NULL OR PROC_STATUS='' ) AND DEL_STATUE=0

select HS.*,CON.CON_STATUS,CON.BACK_BRANCH,CON.BANK_NO,CON.INTEREST,CON.CON_AMOUNT,CON.PAY_DATE from HS_APPLY HS LEFT JOIN HS_CONTRACT CON ON HS.APPLY_ID=CON.APPLY_ID where HS.PROC_STATUS='success' AND HS.ID_NUMBER=#{idCard} AND IS_APP!=1

select HS.*,CON.CON_STATUS,CON.BACK_BRANCH,CON.BANK_NO,CON.INTEREST,CON.CON_AMOUNT,CON.PAY_DATE from HS_APPLY HS LEFT JOIN HS_CONTRACT CON ON HS.APPLY_ID=CON.APPLY_ID where HS.PROC_STATUS='success' AND HS.ID_NUMBER=#{idCard} AND IS_APP=1

SELECT HS_APPLY.* FROM HS_APPLY LEFT JOIN HS_CONTRACT ON HS_APPLY.APPLY_ID=HS_CONTRACT.APPLY_ID WHERE HS_APPLY.ID_NUMBER=#{idCard} AND ( ( HS_APPLY.PROC_STATUS!='waiver' AND HS_APPLY.PROC_STATUS!='reject' AND HS_APPLY.PROC_STATUS!='rejectPool' ) OR HS_APPLY.PROC_STATUS IS NULL OR HS_APPLY.PROC_STATUS='' ) AND HS_APPLY.IS_APP=1 AND HS_CONTRACT.CON_STATUS !='2' AND HS_CONTRACT.CON_STATUS !='4'
SELECT * FROM HS_APPLY WHERE ID_NUMBER=#{idCard} AND (PROC_STATUS='reject' or PROC_STATUS='rejectPool' )

select HS.APPLY_ID,CON.CON_STATUS from HS_APPLY HS LEFT JOIN HS_CONTRACT CON ON HS.APPLY_ID=CON.APPLY_ID where HS.CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CON.CON_STATUS !='2' AND CON.CON_STATUS !='4' AND CON.CON_STATUS !='0' order by APPLY_DATE
select APPLY_ID, CUST_NAME, LOAN_ID, ID_NUMBER, APPLY_AMOUNT, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, CUST_MOBILE,CREATE_EMPLOYEE,CREATE_EMPLOYEE_VAL from HS_APPLY where APPLY_ID = #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update HS_APPLY set CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNCONFIRM_VAL='未人脸识别', SIGNCONFIRM='0' where ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IS_APP!=-1
mapper.select: SELECT SYSDATE - MAX(FIN.AUDIT_DATE) FROM HS_FINAL_AUDIT FIN WHERE FIN.HANDLE_OPINION='0' and FIN.APPLY_ID=( select APPLY_ID from HS_APPLY WHERE ID_NUMBER=#{idNumber} and APPLY_DATE=( select max(APPLY_DATE) FROM HS_APPLY WHERE ID_NUMBER=#{idNumber} AND IS_APP!='1' ) )

SELECT FAU.APPLY_ID, FAU.HANDLE_OPINION, FAU.HANDLE_OPINION_VAL, FAU.REJECT_TYPE, FAU.REJECT_TYPE_VAL FROM ( SELECT FAU.APPLY_ID, FAU.HANDLE_OPINION, FAU.HANDLE_OPINION_VAL, FAU.REJECT_TYPE, FAU.REJECT_TYPE_VAL FROM HS_FINAL_AUDIT FAU WHERE fau.HANDLE_OPINION = 0 AND fau.APPLY_ID = ( SELECT ap.APPLY_ID FROM HS_APPLY ap WHERE ap.APPLY_DATE = ( SELECT MAX (app.APPLY_DATE) FROM HS_APPLY app WHERE app.ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber} AND app.IS_APP!='1' AND PROC_INST_ID IS NOT NULL ) ) ORDER BY FAU.AUDIT_DATE DESC ) fau WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT CREATE_EMPLOYEE FROM HS_APPLY WHERE APPLY_ID=#{applyId}
SELECT ID_NUMBER FROM HS_APPLY WHERE APPLY_ID=#{applyId}
SELECT ID_NUMBER,APPLY_ID FROM HS_APPLY WHERE APPLY_DATE>TO_DATE('2018-01-20', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DEL_STATUE='0' AND IS_APP!=0
SELECT IS_APP from HS_APPLY WHERE APPLY_ID=#{applyId}
SELECT PROC_STATUS FROM HS_APPLY WHERE ID_NUMBER=#{idNumber} AND DEL_STATUE='0'
